thread.title: Great Location and Excellent Staff
thread.title_full: Great Location and Excellent Staff - Review of London City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Christine P
title: Great Location and Excellent Staff
text:
London City Hotel was in a great location, so easy to get around London on the bus or underground. We stayed in the garden apartment and it was perfect, very clean and everything looked new, parking was in the carpark of apartment block, ideal. The staff were so very helpful and pleasant, showing us both the double and apartment room as it had become available. We were very pleased with our choice of place to stay and would have no hesitation in booking again or recommending this to friends. Thank you London City Hotel,
Room Tip: Garden apartment was on the ground floor with a balcony, nice to have a glass of wine and relax outs... See more room tips
